name: Party HardWare
description:
PARTY HARDWARE:

Keep the party vibes high, while making sure it doesn't get too out of hand and someone calls the cops on you!

Complete various mini games around the house, from playing beer pong, to catching falling china. These will either raise the "Fun" gauge, or lower the "Noise" gauge. 

Keep the "Fun" gauge high and the "Noise" gauge low, for the ultimate party going experience!

CONTROLS:

Click on a room to move to it, once in a room, you can click on the purple, glowing areas to play a mini game. 

Red or Yellow Exclamation icons will appear over these mini game areas throughout the game.

Red Icons indicate a mini game to lower the “Noise” gauge.

Yellow Icons indicate a mini game to raise the “Fun” gauge.

MINIGAMES:

Keg Stand:

Click the left and right mouse buttons to balance yourself so you don’t fall over!

Plate Catch:

Move your mouse to catch the plates falling from above.

Beer Pong:

Click the left mouse button at just the right time to throw the ping pong ball into the cup.

Door Knock:

Click the left mouse button repeatedly as fast as you can to knock on the door and get the person inside to finish up.

This game does not constitute medical advice, and should not be relied upon as such
